# Making trait processes with `make.traits()`

Trait processes always need the following input arguments

 * `x0`: the previous trait value(s)
 * `edge.length`: the branch length value
 * `...`: a placeholder for any extra arguments

If it contains at least these arguments, it should be handled correctly by `make.traits` an `dads`


> It is highly recommended to set all arguments (but `x0`) to a default value.
